import "./contact.css"; import Navbar from "../../components/navbar/navbar"; import emailjs from "emailjs-com"; const Mailer = () => { function sendEmail(e) { e.preventDefault(); emailjs .sendForm( "service_5l7kh0n", "template_gx7wc6r", e.target, "user_MwbDvlvwreTZP8lUuL6jE" ) .then((res) => { console.log(res); }) .catch((err) => console.log(err)); } const [experiences, setExperiences] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { axios .get("http://localhost:5003/experience/") .then((response) => { console.log(response.data); setExperiences([...response.data]); }) .catch((error) => { console.log(error); }); }, []); // export default class Contacts extends Component{ // render(){ return (
